scripts.check: npm run frontend:check && npm run backend:check
scripts.dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.frontend:dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=3000 && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.backend:dev: export BACKEND_PORT=3001 && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && cd frontend && npm run build
